subject: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your refinance appication
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply want to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$278,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://hodestone.com/
